res-cleaning.title: Executive Cleaning
res-cleaning.description: Deep sanitation for high-standard residences. We use biodegradable products and state-of-the-art technology.

res-truck-rental.title: Truck Rental
res-truck-rental.description: Modern fleet for transporting loads and moving. Qualified drivers and full insurance.

res-material.title: Material Supply
res-material.description: High-quality construction and finishing materials for your site. Scheduled delivery.

res-assembly.title: Technical Assembly
res-assembly.description: Specialists in designer furniture and complex installations. Absolute care for your pieces.

corp-concierge.title: Concierge
corp-concierge.description: Executive reception services, access management, and premium administrative support for your office.

corp-cleaning.title: Industrial Cleaning
corp-cleaning.description: Specialized teams for large areas, warehouses, and large offices with specific machinery.

corp-waste.title: Waste Management
corp-waste.description: Sustainable waste management, selective sorting, and certified disposal of corporate materials.

corp-office-staff.title: Office Staff
corp-office-staff.description: Daily support for cafeteria, office organization, restroom cleaning, and workplace order maintenance.

SwissSection.title: The Swiss Standard of <muted>Service Delivery</muted>
SwissSection.description: We don't just clean or repair. We take care of your assets with the utmost discretion and technical precision.

punctuality.title: Absolute Punctuality
punctuality.description: Strict respect for your time. Our professionals follow precise schedules, ensuring that every step of the service is executed at the exact moment.

excellence.title: Technical Excellence
excellence.description: Professionals trained to the highest global facility standards. We use Swiss methodologies to ensure an impeccable finish in every detail.

discretion.title: Total Discretion
discretion.description: Confidentiality and respect for your privacy are fundamental pillars. Our team is trained to be invisible if necessary and present if requested.

guarantee.title: La Global Guarantee
guarantee.description: Liability insurance and satisfaction guarantee for all services. Your peace of mind is our main success indicator.

Footer.description: Excellence in global services. Bringing the Swiss quality standard and precision to your asset management.
Footer.copyright: © 2024 LA Global Express. All rights reserved.

info.title: Let's Raise <brand>the Standard.</brand>
info.description: We are ready to optimize your company's logistics with personalized global solutions.

form.description: Fill out the form below and our consultants will contact you within 24h.
